channel.title: TypeScript on Pengjielee's blog
channel.description: Recent content in TypeScript on Pengjielee's blog

item.title: React中使用TypeScript
item.description: 初始化 $ mkdir react-ts-app $ cd react-ts-app $ npm init -y $ npm install react react-dom $ mkdir src $ cd src $ touch index.html $ touch App.tsx src/index.html <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <meta charset="utf-8" /> <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge"> <title>React + TypeScript</title> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"> </head> <body> <div id="main"></div> <script src="./App.tsx"></script> </body> </html> 安装Parcel $ npm i parcel-bundler -D $ npm i typescript -D $ npm i -D @types/react @types/react-dom package.
